title: Terms & Conditions
intro: Welcome to Swifthaul Logistics. By using our website, services, or booking deliveries, you agree to the following Terms & Conditions. Please read them carefully.

sections.heading: 1. Acceptance of Terms
sections.description: By accessing or using our services, you confirm that you agree to these Terms & Conditions. If you do not agree, please do not use our services.

sections.heading: 2. Service Scope
sections.description: We provide logistics and delivery services within Lagos and Kwara State, with expansion planned. Certain items (illegal, dangerous, or restricted goods) are not permitted.

sections.heading: 3. Booking & Payment
sections.description: All bookings must be confirmed through WhatsApp, phone, or email. Payment is required before dispatch unless agreed otherwise. Prices vary based on distance, weight, urgency, and quantity.

sections.heading: 4. Customer Responsibilities
sections.description: Customers must: Provide accurate pickup and delivery details. Ensure recipients are available at the destination. Notify us of fragile or high-value items before booking.

sections.heading: 5. Delivery Policy
sections.description: Same-city deliveries typically take 1-3 hours depending on traffic and distance. Delays caused by traffic, weather or emergencies will be communicated promptly. Some deliveries may require proof of identity upon receipt.

sections.heading: 6. Liability and Insurance
sections.description: We handle all items with care. Swifthaul is not liable for losses/damages caused by inaccurate information provided by customers. For high-value items, additional insurance can be arranged at booking.

sections.heading: 7. Cancellation and Refunds
sections.description: Cancellations must be made before dispatch. Refunds (if applicable) will be processed within 5-7 working days

sections.heading: 8. Partnerships and Recruitment
sections.description: Corporate clients and vendors may partner with swifthaul under separate agreements. Rider recruitment is periodic and subject to background checks

sections.heading: Update to Terms
sections.description: We may update these Terms and conditions at any time. Continued use of our services after changes means you accept the new terms.

sections.heading: Contact Us
sections.description: For questions or concerns about these Terms and conditions: Email: swifthaullogisticsservices@gmail.com, phone: +234-705757-6394 (WhatsApp)
